tasks.title: Make the Logo Bigger (Again)
tasks.description: The CEO's nephew said the logo looks 'weak.' Make it 10% bigger… for the 5th time this week.
tasks.completion_text: Logo now occupies 30% of the screen. Marketing weeps quietly in the break room.

tasks.title: Update the Office Wifi Password
tasks.description: Someone wrote 'password123' on the bathroom wall. IT says you need to change it.
tasks.completion_text: New password is 'password124'. You have achieved security.

tasks.title: Fix Typo in Footer
tasks.description: The footer says 'Copyrite 2019'. Legal noticed. Fix it before the lawyers get involved.
tasks.completion_text: Footer now says 'Copyright 2024'. Legal sends a thumbs-up emoji.

tasks.title: Center the Logo on Mobile
tasks.description: The logo is 2 pixels off-center on iPhone 6. Designer cannot sleep until it's fixed.
tasks.completion_text: Logo centered. Designer sleeps. You wonder if this is what your CS degree was for.

tasks.title: Add a Cookie Banner (EU Compliance)
tasks.description: Legal says we need a cookie banner. Make it annoying enough that people click Accept.
tasks.completion_text: Banner covers 40% of screen. 100% of users click Accept without reading. Mission accomplished.

tasks.title: The Printer is 'Hacking Us'
tasks.description: Office printer randomly prints cat memes. CFO insists it's a cyberattack. 'Investigate.'
tasks.completion_text: Found Jim from Accounting feeding the printer memes. He got a promotion for 'security awareness.'

tasks.title: Rename 'Submit' to 'Go'
tasks.description: Product manager read a UX blog. Now every button needs 'action-oriented microcopy.'
tasks.completion_text: Button now says 'Go'. Conversion rate unchanged. PM claims victory anyway.

tasks.title: Add Loading Spinner
tasks.description: Users complain the app 'feels slow.' Add a spinner. Don't actually optimize anything.
tasks.completion_text: Spinner added. Users now watch a spinny circle instead of a blank screen. Problem solved.

tasks.title: Remove Comic Sans (Emergency)
tasks.description: Junior dev used Comic Sans in production. Client noticed. Revert before anyone else sees.
tasks.completion_text: Comic Sans purged. Junior dev learns a valuable lesson about font choices.

tasks.title: Add 'Powered by AI' Badge
tasks.description: Marketing wants an AI badge on the homepage. There is no AI. Add it anyway.
tasks.completion_text: Badge added. It's a PNG. Marketing sends champagne to the office.

tasks.title: Fix the LinkedIn Integration
tasks.description: Users can't share to LinkedIn. Turns out we never built that feature. Build it now.
tasks.completion_text: LinkedIn share button works. Three people use it. You question your life choices.

tasks.title: Fix the 'Sent with Wrong Font' Email
tasks.description: Marketing sent 50K emails in Comic Sans. 'Undo' the send before customers notice.
tasks.completion_text: Emails 'recalled.' 12 customers still replied with 'lol nice font'.

tasks.title: Add Dark Mode (But Keep the Old One)
tasks.description: Half the team wants dark mode, the other half hates change. Support both… forever.
tasks.completion_text: Now maintaining two UIs. The team argues about which one is 'canon.'

tasks.title: Migrate to New API (Breaking Changes)
tasks.description: Third-party API deprecated v1. Migrate to v2. Everything changed. Good luck.
tasks.completion_text: Migration complete. Only broke 3 features. Calls it a win.

tasks.title: Make It Pop (But Don't Change Anything)
tasks.description: Designer says the UI needs to 'pop more,' but rejects every color/font/animation you try.
tasks.completion_text: Added a single 1-pixel glow. Designer calls it 'revolutionary.' You need a drink.

tasks.title: The 'AI' Sticker Feature
tasks.description: Sales promised 'AI-powered stickers' to a client. You have 3 days to fake it.
tasks.completion_text: Stickers now 'magically' appear when clicked. Client is thrilled. You feel dirty.

tasks.title: Optimize the 'Like' Button (For 0.0001s Gain)
tasks.description: VP wants the button 0.0001s faster to 'beat competitors.' Rewrite the entire stack.
tasks.completion_text: Speed improved by 0.0001s. VP claims credit. The backend is now held together by duct tape.

tasks.title: Add Blockchain (For Some Reason)
tasks.description: The board read a buzzword-heavy article. Now your to-do app 'needs blockchain integration.'
tasks.completion_text: Added a button that says 'Blockchain Enabled!' It just plays mining sounds.

tasks.title: CEO's 'Simple' Excel Macro
tasks.description: 'Just automate this 200-step spreadsheet! How hard could it be?' *(Spoiler: Very.)*
tasks.completion_text: Macro works. CEO now wants it to also brew coffee. Your soul leaves your body.

tasks.title: Fix the 'Ghost Bug' in Production
tasks.description: 'Sometimes the app crashes, but only on Tuesdays when it rains.' No logs. Good luck.
tasks.completion_text: Turns out it was a timezone bug in a dependency from 2008. You get a stress ball as a reward.

tasks.title: Implement Real-Time Notifications (Websockets)
tasks.description: Users want instant notifications. Build a websocket system from scratch. Budget: $0.
tasks.completion_text: Websockets work. Server costs triple. Finance is not happy.

tasks.title: Refactor the Monolith (While It's Running)
tasks.description: CTO wants microservices. Can't shut down production. Refactor while users are active.
tasks.completion_text: Half monolith, half microservices. Nobody understands how it works anymore. It's fine.

tasks.title: Build an Admin Dashboard (Yesterday)
tasks.description: Sales sold a client an admin dashboard that doesn't exist. Demo is tomorrow. Go.
tasks.completion_text: Dashboard exists. It's held together by prayers and setTimeouts. Client signs contract.

tasks.title: Fix Legacy Code (No Documentation)
tasks.description: Critical bug in code written by someone who quit 5 years ago. No comments. No tests.
tasks.completion_text: Bug fixed. You now understand ancient PHP. This knowledge will haunt you.

tasks.title: Migrate Database (Zero Downtime)
tasks.description: Postgres to MongoDB. No downtime allowed. Schema is a nightmare. CEO is watching.
tasks.completion_text: Migration successful. Downtime: 0.2 seconds. CEO didn't notice. You aged 10 years.

tasks.title: Implement SSO (5 Different Providers)
tasks.description: Enterprise client demands SSO with Google, Microsoft, Okta, SAML, and 'whatever Amazon uses.'
tasks.completion_text: SSO works. OAuth flow is a maze of redirects. You dream in JWT tokens.

tasks.title: Scale to 1M Users (Budget: One VM)
tasks.description: App went viral. Traffic is 100x normal. Servers are on fire. Budget unchanged.
tasks.completion_text: Added caching, CDN, and aggressive rate limiting. Site survives. Your hairline does not.
